desc: Miss the days of print Nintendo magazines? Or bespoke Nintendo publications? The Ninty Media store is where you will find Switch Player Magazine, Ninty Fresh Magazine and other print products.

layout.text: Miss the days of print Nintendo coverage?

We did, so we made our own. At Ninty Media we make TWO completely different Nintendo magazines! Switch Player is dedicated to the Nintendo Switch whilst Ninty Fresh covers all of Nintendo from NES to Now. We have more than 70 different issues available!
